title: Bank of Maharashtra logs 19% loan growth in April-June
description: Bank of Maharashtra reported a 19% growth in credit to Rs 2.09 lakh crore for the April-June quarter, with outstanding credit at Rs 1.75 lakh crore. Total deposits increased by 9.44% to Rs 2.67 lakh crore, with Current Accounts and Savings Accounts declining to 49.86%. Credit Deposit ratio increased to 78.18%.
